entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Normandin 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -32.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -38.2°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
